llm_res.rule: The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success).

llm_res:
YES

The function `totalSupply()` in the provided code violates the ERC-20 rule that requires it to return the total token supply. Instead of returning the constant total supply `_tTotal`, the function adds 21 to `_tTotal`, thus not accurately reflecting the intended total supply of the tokens as defined by the constant `_tTotal`. This modification does not comply with the standard requirement of returning the exact total token supply.
